name: frontend-nanodegree-mobile-portfolio
description: After learning about the critical rendering path in [Website Performance Optimization](https://www.udacity.com/course/ud884), and learning about RAIL (Response, Animate, Idle and Load) the four major life cycles of a web app in [Browser Rendering Optimization](https://www.udacity.com/course/ud860), I was given this project to apply what techniques I had learned.
